headline: Exelon Rings Nasdaq Opening Bell to Celebrate 25 Years of Impact, Innovation, and Community Commitment
summary: CHICAGO, October 13, 2025--Today, Exelon (Nasdaq: EXC), one of the nation’s largest utility companies, rang the opening bell at the Nasdaq MarketSite in Times Square to commemorate the company’s 25th anniversary. The milestone event honored the company’s legacy of delivering customers affordable and reliable energy, investing in communities, and supporting an inclusive, mission-driven workforce.
